channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache -- Storm
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apache -- Storm

item.title: CVE-2018-11779|2024-08-05T08:17:09.126Z -- apache -- storm
item.description: In Apache Storm versions 1.1.0 to 1.2.2, when the user is using the storm-kafka-client or storm-kafka modules, it is possible to cause the Storm UI daemon to deserialize user provided bytes into a Java class.
